_isEnabled.title: Is enabled
_isEnabled.description: Controls whether the Page Level Progress extension is enabled or disabled for this page.

_showPageCompletion.title: Show page completion
_showPageCompletion.description: Controls whether the progress calculations for this page are based on all components and the overall page - or only the components that are set to be displayed in Page Level Progress.

_isCompletionIndicatorEnabled.title: Show page completion indicator
_isCompletionIndicatorEnabled.description: Controls whether the completion indicator shows next to the page title.

_excludeAssessments.title: Exclude assessments.
_excludeAssessments.description: Controls whether the progress calculations will include assessments.
